citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:40 PM on 14
December 2023. Voicemails were left on both phone numbers and the inspector waited up to 30 minutes at the facility for
a response. A "Sorry We Missed You" letter was left along with a business card.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:40 PM on 14 
December 2023. Voicemails were left on both phone numbers and the inspector waited up to 30 minutes at the facility for 
a response. A "Sorry We Missed You" letter was left along with a business card. 
 
 
End Section
